snippet: MARCUS--Marvin David. (July 31, 1927 - February 20, 2016). A celebration of Marvin's life will be held in Santa Barbara, CA, on May 27, 2016. Those interested in attending, please contact his daughter Karen Melissa at Melissa.Marcus@nau.edu In lieu of flowers, please consider a donation to Villa Alamar, 45 E. Alamar Ave., Santa Barbara, CA, 93105. May his memory be a blessing. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MARCUS, MARVIN DAVID
